Sitting in Jo’s downtown in Austin eating their fried egg sandwich and reminiscing about amazing times I’ve had with good friends in this city. The same sandwich fought off hangovers and jetlag back in 2012 after a talk at SXSW. (Thanks for capturing that, @benpbarnett!) https://t.co/MYJTnb0fYp
